Posted By: Azr43l (7/10/2009 9:08:17 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This is a little odd. Back in 1994 - 1995, we didn't consider this card "broken". Sure, it is an awesome card, but then again this card WAS the color red, just like "Dark Ritual" WAS the color black. This may sound obscene, but I don't think "Lightning Bolt" should have gone out of print for such a long time. Magic lost alot of it's appeal for me (and many of my friends) when "Lightning Bolt" turned into "Shock", "Hill Giant" became "Superinsectwarrior of Ghribnokthamwab" and "Roc of Kher Ridges" got axed or turned into another generic unpronouncable card. Call us strange, but we considered red the color of mountains, earth, fire and chaos. This means giants, elementals, fireballs, lightning bolts, ogres, orcs, goblins, rocs and even raging rivers.
  
I'm glad MTG tries to return to form a little and bring each color's specific flavor back. Lightning Bolt should never have gone out of print, just like blue needs the basic "Counterspell" back.
  
5 colors, each unique and it's on own flavo... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

This may sound obscene, but I don't think "Lightning Bolt" should have gone out of print for such a long time. Magic lost alot of it's appeal for me (and many of my friends) when "Lightning Bolt" turned into "Shock", "Hill Giant" became "Superinsectwarrior of Ghribnokthamwab" and "Roc of Kher Ridges" got axed or turned into another generic unpronouncable card. Call us strange, but we considered red the color of mountains, earth, fire and chaos. This means giants, elementals, fireballs, lightning bolts, ogres, orcs, goblins, rocs and even raging rivers.
I'm glad MTG tries to return to form a little and bring each color's specific flavor back. Lightning Bolt should never have gone out of print, just like blue needs the basic "Counterspell" back.

after having all the cards that deal two damage and some other effect, it's good to see the cla^ssic burn spell back. with all of the burn we've been getting use to, this is just another hurdle to get over, and I expect to see lots of lightning bolt/ball lightning decks again.
  
   
Flavor text is the best ^.^
  
   
Slightly broken, but then again, all the colors seem to be getting a boost so whatever.
  
   
Lightning, btw, does strike twice.
